job_title: Director of Development in Memphis, TN
pros:
I love waking up to work for a company that provides such positive impact to our Mid-South community. 
Fantastic supervisor!
Good employee benefits!
Great work culture and morale!
cons: NONE! I have no cons to state at this time. This is such a great company to work for! I have been here for over 5 years!

pros: At least you make a little money...
cons: They don't call what I do for Meritan a "job". They call it "training". I am at a non profit foundation called COMEC. The Commission for Missing and Exploited Children. It is a good organization but I don't have much to do and I get bored because of that. I am paid by the government, only $7.25 and hour for 20 hours of work per week. (Not enough). I am 68 years old and they are an agency to help Senior Citizens in the workforce. I am not being trained on anything new. I think these non-profits just want free help to answer the phones. Meritan makes you look for a job while you do this. There is ALWAYS something they want you to do! Classes at the TN Career Center and job fairs...There is also a problem faxing your time sheet! You have to do it several times, as they say they didn't get it. But the printout says they did. It is a typical government agency. The people that work there are not trained right. You can get 10 different answers from 10 different people.  They try hard but are seriously understaffed.

pros: Meritan really believes in it's mission and providing all clients and employees the best for both.  The company has been name a top workplace in Memphis for 4 years in a row and recently received the top award for Flexible Worklife balance.  It offers unique benefits to its employees.  The President of the company is hands on and understands "life happens" and life emergencies.
cons: As with all employers, the cost of health insurance premiums continue to rise, but that is everywhere.  Other than than, there are no other cons.

review_title: Dedicated not only to clients, but to staff
pros:
Love seeing the dedicated work and services Meritan provides for the community.  Great benefits of vacation, sick, dental, etc. '

Provides lots of opportunity for growth if you are willing to put the work in.    

Great work/life balance. 

Rated one of the top workplaces in Memphis.
cons: Like all companies this day and age, the cost of health insurance.   Loss of programs due to funding cuts, but staff work hard to find you inside or outside job placement.

job_title: Chief Administrative Officer in Memphis, TN
pros:
Dedicated, thoughtful employees
Diverse services - RN, PT, OT, Social Workers, expert caregivers for seniors, families, persons with disabilities, and seniors in career retraining
Patient & client focus
Online records, mobile devices
Recruiting parents to foster and adopt children
Largest non profit Home Health not in a hospital system
Great leave
Great benefits
Competitive pay
Management & coworker support
Meritan serves patients' and clients' needs, safely, crisis or not.
cons:
Nothing really.
It is a challenge to simply explain the number of services we take into peoples lives.

pros: Friendly environment and I am able to reach/talk with the CEO of the company on any given day. My supervisor is a AVP of the company. I have learned that Meritan does not discriminate! I know a lot of companies say it however, I have seen everyone move up no matter race, creed or origin. The benefits are good and Meritan takes care of their own.
cons: They do not pay a lot.

job_title: Quality Improvement Officer in Memphis, TN
pros: Employees are dedicated to the mission and improving the lives of vulnerable populations. The agency offers some inventive and transcendent benefits that assist in improving the lives of employees. Management is willing to try new approaches and technology is embraced.
cons: None really. The vast array of services leads to a vast array of auditors and standards.

pros: There are opportunities for employees to develop skills and experience in several areas.
cons: There is a lot of fundraising for everyone.

pros: I have worked for Meritan in Home Health for 12 years and have always felt valued and trusted.
cons: I do not have negative views on working for Meritan

job_title: Chief Financial Officer in Memphis, TN
pros: Friendly environment and management works well with staff.
cons: There is nothing negative to report here.

pros: Fast paced work environment with excellent co-workers.
cons: Few opportunities for employee advancement.

job_title: Home Health Aide in Memphis, TN
pros: Not a good place to work
cons: Poor management low paying money
